steps.name: Step 10 : Click on Material master from left side menus
Step 11 : Click on view dropdown icon
Step 12 : Click on Default view option
Step 13 : Click on add new record button
Step 14 : Click on Sequential Material option
Step 15 : Click on Industry sector dropdown and select value from it
Step 17 : Select value from X-Plant Material Status field
